::Feline::
She purred softly. "Yes, I was wondering if you would be so kind as 
to help Zardus when he is finished with that femme on the table now. 
Zardus will need all the info that you have about the Cybertron 
Fire."" She walked up to him and kisses him.  then she looked into is 
eyes, "Please give him the info that he wants. I want your co-
operation to prove that you are loyal." then she whispered into his 
ear,"So we can be together."
